code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{Form,Alert}from"react-bootstrap";import{Button}from"react-bootstrap";import{useUserAuth}from"../context/UserAuthContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Signup=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const{signUp}=useUserAuth();let navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError("");try{await signUp(email,password);navigate("/");}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-3",children:"Firebase Auth Signup"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{variant:"danger",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3",controlId:"formBasicEmail",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"email",placeholder:"Email address",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Group,{className:"mb-3",controlId:"formBasicPassword",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-grid gap-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",type:"Submit",children:"Sign up"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 box mt-3 text-center",children:["Already have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Log In"})]})]});};export default Signup;
